title: Hour 3 - Mike Florio (05-19-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Mike Florio (05-19-20)
description:
Mike Florio talks about how NFL camps are opening but not is not universal for all NFl teams. Mike tells Dan that a way for the NFL to deal with diversity is to pay a better entry level income. Mike says better pay as they come thru the door may help develop a more diverse hiring pool of candidates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Mike Florio talks about how NFL camps are opening but not is not universal for all NFl teams. Mike tells Dan that a way for the NFL to deal with diversity is to pay a better entry level income.
